## parseColor() function

parse a css color value to RGBA color type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function parseColor(input: string): ColorRGBA;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | string | The css color value. |

**Returns:**

[ColorRGBA](doc/markdown/./base.colorrgba.md)

The RGBA color value.
